<S%H403>Surely<s%> he has <S%H5375>borne<s%> our <S%H2483>griefs,<s%> and <S%H5445>carried<s%> our <S%H4341>sorrows:<s%> yet we did <S%H2803>esteem<s%> him <S%H5060>stricken,<s%> <S%H5221>smitten<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6031>afflicted.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> we like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> have <S%H8582>gone<s%> <S%H8582>astray;<s%> we have <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to his own <S%H1870>way;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6293>laid<s%> on him the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of us <S%H3605>all.<s%>

Yet it <S%H2654>pleased<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H1792>bruise<s%> him; he has put him to <S%H2470>grief:<s%> <S%H518>when<s%> you shall <S%H7760>make<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> an offering for <S%H817>sin,<s%> he shall <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H2233>seed,<s%> he shall <S%H748>prolong<s%> his <S%H3117>days,<s%> and the <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

He shall <S%H7200>see<s%> of the <S%H5999>travail<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and shall be <S%H7646>satisfied:<s%> by his <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> shall my <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6663>justify<s%> <S%H7227>many;<s%> for he shall <S%H5445>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> will I <S%H2505>divide<s%> him a <S%H2506>portion<s%> with the <S%H7227>great,<s%> and he shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> with the <S%H6099>strong;<s%> <S%H8478>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> he has <S%H6168>poured<s%> out his <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H4194>death:<s%> and he was <S%H4487>numbered<s%> with the <S%H6586>transgressors;<s%> and he <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H2399>sin<s%> of <S%H7227>many,<s%> and made <S%H6293>intercession<s%> for the <S%H6586>transgressors.<s%>
